product_name: Croakies Terra Combo Eyewear Retainer - XL/XXL
long_description: Don't lose your new sunglasses! Attach the Croakies Terra Combo Eyewear Retainer in XL/XXL and keep them around your neck during hiking, biking, kayaking and other sports. The Terra sport retainer comes with 2 pair of reattachable end options: XL and XXL. Adjustable nylon cord has a slider so you can tighten the fit during activity and loosen it while relaxed.
short_description: Don't lose your new sunglasses! Attach the Croakies Terra Combo Eyewear Retainer in XL/XXL and keep them around your neck during hiking, biking, kayaking and other sports.
